verbs.description: South Korea [V: is] trying to manage the diplomatic crisis between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in order to avert threatened American military action .
[ARG0: South Korea] is [V: trying] [ARG1: to manage the diplomatic crisis between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in order to avert threatened American military action] .
[ARG0: South Korea] is trying to [V: manage] [ARG1: the diplomatic crisis between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-PRP: in order to avert threatened American military action] .
[ARG0: South Korea] is trying to manage the diplomatic crisis between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in order to [V: avert] [ARG1: threatened American military action] .
South Korea is trying to manage the diplomatic crisis between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un in order to avert [V: threatened] [ARG1: American military action] .
